clinical_study.brief_title: Effects and Tolerability With Clenpiq and Low Residue Diet
clinical_study.official_title: The Effects and Tolerability of a Prescribed Low Residue Diet the Day Before Colonoscopy on the Cleanliness of the Colon vs. the Traditional Clear Liquid, Day Before Diet With the Use of the Clenpiq Bowel Purgative

brief_summary.textblock: The Efficacy of Clenpiq utilized per FDA labeling, with a low residue diet the day before colonoscopy.

detailed_description.textblock: This study proposes to assess the use of a low residue diet of a prescribed nature the day before colonoscopy for breakfast, lunch and early dinner. Clinical outcomes utilizing the low residue diet will be compared to the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) approved split dose labeling, including the traditional clear liquid diet the day before colonoscopy utilizing the Clenpiq (Ferring Pharmaceuticals) bowel preparation.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: single blind trial of FDA approved preparation with per labeling clear liquid diet versus a single day low residue diet
study_design_info.masking_description: Investigator will be ignorant of how preparation was taken

primary_outcome.measure: Statistical equivalence of the clear liquid and low residue cohorts
primary_outcome.description: Using the Boston Bowel Preparation Score, the 3 sections of the colon will be graded on adequacy of preparation at the colonoscopy

secondary_outcome.description: Number of polyps detected and removed per total number of patients in each arm

arm_group.description: Following instructions with FDA-labeled clear liquids
Following instructions for a low residue diet along with FDA-labeled clear liquids

intervention.description: Variable cohort will eat 3 low residue meals on the day prior to their planned colonoscopy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- All subjects age 18-80 requiring colonoscopy for appropriate indications
Exclusion Criteria:
- Active diarrhea (Greater than 3 unformed stools daily)
- Constipation (Less than 3 spontaneous bowel movements per week) Each within 2 weeks of the scheduled Colonoscopy.
Additional exclusion criteria would include;
- Subjects with a history of inflammatory bowel disease
- Colonic resection of any length
- Pregnant women
- American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) score greater than 3
- Body Mass Index (BMI) greater than 50
- Previous reaction to this bowel preparation or contraindications to taking Clenpiq per the package labeling guidelines.
- Subjects unable to give their own informed consent.
